W in as LB and you can W back, doing the same amount of Burst as Nidalee while also having an 'Oh f-ck' button. 

Honestly, if you just land a slow on Nidalee, she gets destroyed. There's also the whole... Don't Chase Nidalee or Singed. Why? Because they'll outrun you in the bushes, do non-stop damage against you, and kite you to oblivion. So what do you do? You let them run at you. Nidalee's entire kit requires her to land a spear then pounce at you. If she pounces at you, she doesn't have an undo button. If she jumps and can't kill her target because they dashed before her Q hits, she's now completely and utterly screwed since most dashes are 500ish range (Including flash) and her own is only 375, unless marked.
